# AI Resume Analyzer

## Project Overview

AI Resume Analyzer built with Next.js App Router, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Gemini API, and pdf-parse.

## Setup Complete âœ“

Project is ready to run. All dependencies installed and configured.

## Quick Start

1. Add your Gemini API key to `.env.local`
2. Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
3. Open http://localhost:3000
